title: Cannot create PBE account at all
body:
NA boards, I got faith in you.    
I got the same problem as this [gif ](http://embed.gyazo.com/2f4739dd55649eb71e8a4865a447d8bc.gif)posted few years ago and I'm awaiting proper response from Riot Support from 3 days. I got mail from Riot on Nov 8 and I sent ticket on the same day after referring to a pinned thread because I wasn't able to create an account that time.     

There are 2 possible outcomes when I try to register;
1. When I'm logged into the website, and open the link to create PBE account from mail, i get stuck on second step of PBE registration which is "Application Received". 
2. When I'm not logged into the website, and open the link, it keeps me on "I want to help" page and clicking it will refresh the website.

Solutions I tried;   
Used different browsers 
Used VPN's to change IP(also suggested by support) 
Used incognito + VPN and logged in 
Used the Riot link provided by support which redirects me to the same "Application Received" page.     
Waited 3+ days for the link to work.
Tried registration every 6-12 hours.
Checked whether I'm on proper website(EUW) for 15+ times.
Googled every thread for people struggling to create PBE account and found multiple, too bad I'm one of them as well.  

why me ;_;
{{item:3070}}

replies.body: The URL you are clicking through the email is not a token for your account, and is just taking you to the PBE page.  Meaning, you might be visiting the PBE site while logged into an account that hasn't been accepted at this time.  The email might be intended for an another account, so you'll have to logout of the site and back in with the accepted account.  Hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kmRANAfq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-11T16:33:33.397+0000)
>
> The URL you are clicking through the email is not a token for your account, and is just taking you to the PBE page.  Meaning, you might be visiting the PBE site while logged into an account that hasn't been accepted at this time.  The email might be intended for an another account, so you'll have to logout of the site and back in with the accepted account.  Hope that helps!

The email was sent with my other account's name but another one got accepted wooot
Edit: I actually sent a "forgot username" to my email and checked that associated account. It fucking worked. Thank you fam.   
I can't thank you enough for that <3 <3

> [{quoted}](name=Rusty xD,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kmRANAfq,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-11-11T17:36:50.729+0000)
>
> The email was sent with my other account's name but another one got accepted wooot
> Edit: I actually sent a "forgot username" to my email and checked that associated account. It fucking worked. Thank you fam.   
> I can't thank you enough for that <3 <3

it's still doesn't work for me :(

I got the same problem! Althought I did what you say here but when I clicked on "I want to help!" i had to applicate for being a PBE Tester when I already have been accepted by email! :/ Look up: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/aUgG6cnE-cant-have-access-to-pbe-registration
